Name: Cosmo Blaster
About the game: Jump into your ship and shoot asteroids and UFOs in this high speed classic 80's style space shooter If you like addictive fast paced shooters and like to beat your high scores, then this is for YOU! - 15 Levels of difficulty or time attack mode - 3 Lives - Shields - Triple shot - Increasing shoot speed - Fuel pickups - Ammo pickups - High score board Each time you level up your gun fires faster and faster but make sure it doesn’t overheat! On your last life, don’t fear you may be lucky and an extra life pickup may appear, who knows Just don't run out of fuel or ammo! Update Steam Deck playability Set compatability to 'Proton Experimental' Set control layout to 'Game Pad' Controls: R1 = Thruster R2 = Shield A = Fire D-Pad for Left/Right rotate Menu button to go back to main menu Y = Pause use touch screen for onscreen buttons/entering name An offical Steam Deck build is in the works!
